Kodemore Properties

bootstrap
property description type default
bootstrapSystemHostname  This is primarily used when bootstraping the initial 'system' tenant. After the initial bootstrap, the application should rely on the hostname configured in the tenant database and identified by the 'system' uid in case the hostname is reconfigured in the live system.  string  system.localhost 


chores
property description type default
applicationLogFlusherChoreActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
applicationLogFlusherChoreEnabled  Indicates if the chore should be run.  boolean  true 
applicationLogFlusherChoreIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 
clearThemeCacheChoreActiveSeconds  The active frequency of the chore.  integer  300 
clearThemeCacheChoreEnabled  Indicates if the chore should be run.  boolean  true 
clearThemeCacheChoreIdleSeconds  The idle frequency of the chore.  integer  300 
log4jReloaderChoreActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
log4jReloaderChoreEnabled  Control whether the log4j config file is automatically reloaded during runtime.  boolean  true 
log4jReloaderChoreIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 
maintenanceChoreActiveSeconds  x  integer  60 
maintenanceChoreEnabled  Indicates if the chore should be run.  boolean  true 
maintenanceChoreIdleSeconds  x  integer  60 
monitorChoreActiveSeconds  x  integer  600 
monitorChoreEnabled  Indicates if the chore should be run.  boolean  true 
monitorChoreIdleSeconds  x  integer  600 
overridesReloaderChoreActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
overridesReloaderChoreEnabled  Control whether the Overrides file is automatically reloaded during runtime.  boolean  true 
overridesReloaderChoreIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 
performanceLogFlusherChoreActiveSeconds  x  integer  10 
performanceLogFlusherChoreEnabled  Indicates if the chore should be run.  boolean  true 
performanceLogFlusherChoreIdleSeconds  x  integer  10 


databaseConnection
property description type default
databaseDriver  Database connection.  string   
databasePassword  Database connection.  string   
databaseSchema  Database connection.  string   
databaseUri  Database connection.  string   
databaseUser  Database connection.  string   


databasePatch
property description type default
databaseSyncOnStartup  The application normally synchronizes the database patches upon startup. The patch tool uses an a pessimistic database lock to ensure single threaded operation even across multiple concurrent JVMs. This is typically enabled in production and provides for the standard way to deploy database migration scripts.  boolean  true 


debug
property description type default
ajaxLogDeleteOnStart  If true, the ajax log file is deleted when tomcat starts.  boolean  false 
ajaxLogEnabled  If true, all ScAjaxResults are logged in $webRoot/ajaxLog.txt.  boolean  false 
autoLoginEmail  Used in development to enable automatic login.  string   
contextFormatterEnabled  Determines if the context registry is enabled. If enabled, various instances such as KmCommand will store the additional details about the call stack that constructs the original instance. This can be fairly expensive, but is valuable in debugging the context of slow commands.  boolean  false 
contextFormatterLines  The number of lines to include in each context. If set to a value less than or equal to 0 (e.g.: -1), the full context will be stored.  integer  20 
deleteThreadTopicsOnStart  If true, all thread topics are deleted upon application start up. This is useful for simpler testing in development when we are GUARANTEED that there will be only a single JVM running at a time. This should NOT be enabled in stage or prod.  boolean  false 
printAjaxTime  If true, the time spent on each ajax call is logged.  boolean  false 
printAuditLog  If true, logs are echoed to the console (log4j).  boolean  false 
printPerformanceLog  If true, logs are echoed to the console (log4j).  boolean  false 
renderDebugDomComments  If true, render an html comment into the dom that identifies the class name of the page and various controls.  boolean  false 
showHibernateSql  Tell hibernate to show sql. Requires a restart to take effect.  boolean  false 


emailChore
property description type default
sendEmailBatch  The number of emails to send in each batch. Sending batches can be more effecient, but if one email fails it may cause the entire batch to fail.  integer  10 
sendEmailChoreActiveSeconds  The active frequency of the chore.  integer  5 
sendEmailChoreEnabled  Indicates if the chore should be run. Note even if the chore is run, that doesn't mean that emails will actually be sent. See also, the sendEmail* properties.  boolean  true 
sendEmailChoreIdleSeconds  The idle frequency of the chore.  integer  60 
sendEmailEnabled  If false, email sending is completely disabled. The sendEmail chore may still run, no email will be sent, and no emails will be marked as sent.  boolean  true 


emailGoogleMail
property description type default
gmailHost  Connecting to gmail.  string  smtp.gmail.com 
gmailPassword  Connecting to gmail.  string   
gmailPort  Connecting to gmail.  integer  465 
gmailScheme  Connecting to gmail.  string  https 
gmailUser  Connecting to gmail.  string   


emailMethod
property description type default
sendEmailFromAddress  The address that will be listed as the 'from' address.  string  doNotReply@example.net 
sendEmailMethod  The mechanism used to send emails. Options are: smtp, gmail, print, noop. The default is set to 'print', this must be changed in production. [gmail] : Send emails using the gmail passthrough. [print] : Use System.out.print to display the contents of the email. [noop] : No action is take (but the email will still be marked as sent. If you don't want the email to be marked as sent, then you must set sendEmailEnabled=false.  string  print 
sendEmailOverrideTo  If set, then force all emails to be sent to this email address rather than the requested recipients. This can be useful for testing.  string   


emailSmtp
property description type default
smtpHost  Connecting to smtp.  string  smtp 
smtpPassword  Connecting to smtp.  string   
smtpPort  Connecting to smtp.  integer  25 
smtpScheme  Connecting to smtp.  string  smtp 
smtpUseSsl  Use SSL when connecting to smtp.  boolean  false 
smtpUser  Connecting to smtp.  string   


ftp
property description type default
ftpEnabled  When disabled, the details of the message will be logged instead of being sent.  boolean  false 
ftpSendToNotifierChoreActiveSeconds  x  integer  60 
ftpSendToNotifierChoreEnabled  Notify (via ftp) other depots that a device has been 'sent' to them.  boolean  true 
ftpSendToNotifierChoreIdleSeconds  x  integer  60 


googleChart
property description type default
googleChartHost  Configure the google chart url.  string  chart.apis.google.com 
googleChartPath  Configure the google chart url.  string  chart 
googleChartPort  Configure the google chart url.  integer  80 
googleChartScheme  Configure the google chart url.  string  http 


googleMaps
property description type default
googleMapsApiKey  The private/secret api key for google maps api. The default key can be used for lightweight development and testing, but a different key should be used for production due to volume and licensing restrictions.  string  AIzaSyD_WTy8rgoCU_yoGesX86t7tfpDyGsQWjw 


hibernateSecondLevelCache
property description type default
hibernateCacheProvider  Hibernate cache provider class.  string   
hibernateCacheTimeSeconds  How long items should remain in the second level cache.  integer  300 
hibernateMemcachedServers  Names of the Memcached Servers, format is :  string   
hibernateUseSecondLevelCache  Use Hibernate second level caching.  boolean  false 


maintenance
property description type default
maintenancePeriodEndHour  The end of the daily maintenance window. Value should be in the range [0..23] and corresponds to UTC.  integer  6 
maintenancePeriodStartHour  The start of the daily maintenance window. Value should be in the range [0..23] and corresponds to UTC.  integer  6 


monitoring
property description type default
chorePerformanceLogEnabled  When enabled each chore's performance (ms) is logged. This is enabled by default for production, but it is sometimes useful to temporarily disable this, especially in development. Each java chore class can override this to force enablement.  boolean  true 
daoCommandWarningThresholdMs  Dao commands requests that exceed this threshold will be logged as a warning. A value of 0 disables logging.  integer  2000 
sqlWarningThresholdMs  Sql statements that exceed this threshold will be logged as a warning. A value of 0 disables logging.  integer  1000 


oneAll
property description type default
oneAllEnabled  Determine if the oneAll login is enabled. This is disabled by default, and can only be enabled in a hosting environment that has a routable domain name.  boolean  false 
oneAllHost  The oneAll uri used to host our authentication service. This is provided by oneAll. E.g.: ourApplication.api.oneall.com  string   
oneAllPrivateKey  The private key provided by OneAll.  string   
oneAllPublicKey  The public key provided by OneAll.  string   


paths
property description type default
sharedPersistentPath  The path to work files that persist across deployment. Use this path for files like ftp uploads, email attachments, csv uploads and other dynamic content. The contents of this directory are shared across all JVMs so some care needs to be take to avoid collisions. In production, this should be set to an absolute path that is outside of the web root, so that it persists across deployments.  string  /temp/shared/persistent 
sharedTransientPath  The path to work files that persist across deployment. Use this path for files like ftp uploads, email attachments, csv uploads and other dynamic content. The contents of this directory are shared across all JVMs so some care needs to be take to avoid collisions. In production, this should be set to an absolute path that is outside of the web root, so that it persists across deployments.  string  /temp/shared/transient 


production
property description type default
developerEmailCsv  The email address(es) used when the system needs to send a message to the development staff. This may be used for things like unhandled exceptions and feedback. The values should be a comma separated list of email addresses.  string   
environment  Indicates the deployment environment. Valid options are: development, stage, production.  string  development 


serverSession
property description type default
serverSessionSecure  Indicates if the cookie should be set to require secure transmission (https/ssl).  boolean  false 
serverSessionTimeoutSeconds  The length of time that a session may be idle before it is considered to be automatically stale.  integer  3600 


servlet
property description type default
servletSslRedirect  If true, requests to the main application servlet will be redirected as an SSL request.  boolean  false 
webResourceVersioning  This is used to automatically version css and javascript files. none - the version is always set to 'version'. deploy - used in production to include the application version in the path. dev - used in development; changes the path when the app is started.  string  static 
writeLastServletResults  If true, the servlet results are written to the web root directory.  boolean  false 
writeLastServletResultsCounter  If true, a counter is appended to the file name so that the results are not overwritten each time.  boolean  false 


urls
property description type default
marketingUrl  The url used to redirect people to the marketing website.  string  http://www.example.net 
supportUrl  The url used to redirect people to the general support team and/or help desk.  string  http://www.example.net
